website_summaries.verdict: This set of 4 insect-repelling torches adds a classic tropical flair to any landscape.
pros: Made of strong, sturdy iron that holds up well to weather
Citronella oil keeps mosquitoes and other pests at bay
Purchase includes fiberglass wicks, poles, and snuffer caps
cons: Spikes are made of plastic and can snap off if you’re not careful

customer_reviews.title: Metal Torch - But Plastic Spikes
customer_reviews.text: They are attractive for citronella torches, but be aware that the spike on the base the goes into the ground is not made of metal but rather plastic. One of the set I added around our hot tub snapped off when I was putting it in the ground, and the plastic also makes me think these will not be able to be left outside year round, but rather will need to come in for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for any outdoor space!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish tiki torches! Way better than the bamboo type! The color is very nice (bronze)! Easy to put together! Would by again!
customer_reviews.author: Emma R.

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 packages, 8 torches. The first package was fine and I put them in the ground and filled them with oil. When I got to the second package the last 2 (of course) did not have the little hole on the side of the torch to put the key chain/ top holder on. It looked weird to have 6 with lids and 2 without, so I had to throw those 2 away. I wasn't going to go through the trouble of emptying the oil and sending them back. Lastly, don't screw the lids on too tight. They will only get tighter as they burn and you will have to use pliers to get the lids off.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schuchmann

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We got these for an event we were hosting in our backyard. I didn't want the stereotypical wicker torches so I found these instead. The photos don't do them justice, they're a beautiful oiled bronze color and look much more expensive than they are. They were easy to assemble and easy to install (and move, even while lit). We used Firefy brand fuel and they burned for 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Poorly assembled
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 threads on the bottom of the lamp were welded severely off angle and one cap was missing a ring that allows it to attach to the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Burress

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Oil Holder on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly in time for my party.Unfortunately one of the 4 oil canisters had a hairline crack at the base so after making a mess all over the garage floor when I filled it I had to discard it and go with just 3 burners. In conclusion , poor quality and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a 4 piece set
customer_reviews.text: This set was among the least expensive I found for 4 torches, and I have been very happy with them. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Go to hardware store. Don’t buy these online.
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the description better. I’ve used Tiki forever and usually the canisters are easy to remove and have sufficient space to fill without a funnel or adapter from TIKI brand citronella. These are all-in-one units. Not detachable. Had to order an additional tiki funnel adapter to connect to citronella jug to fill very small opening in canister. Wish I’d just gone to hardware store to pick up instead.
customer_reviews.author: BarbandBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: We were slightly disappointed in the size of these tikis. But we assembled and filled them anyway thinking we would at least try them. We were having a get together so we lit them in the afternoon and they ran until midnight (approx 12 hrs). When we tried to refill them the next day. We needed a wrench to get them open. The heat had welded the two sections together. Not a big fan of these! Will keep for backup purposes only.
customer_reviews.author: KC23

customer_reviews.title: Break very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The torches are canisters with a wick. The canisters have a screw-on cap (much like a water bottle ) to pour in the oil. On the bottoms of the canisters are fused bolts to screw hem into the long spikes. After one use, the “bottle caps” fused to the canisters and were not openable. The bolts on the bottom of the canisters are flimsy. One arrived snapped In half. The others. the others bend like paperclips with the slightest pressure. They did burn well. But only for a single fill since I cannot reopen them. This is a very low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: They are just cheap assembled
customer_reviews.text: The torches look elegant and sturdy but the craftsmanship to put them together is really bad. The top part is not sitting straight on the pole and one unit was leaking and we spilled the oil all over our wood decking. We returned them and are still cleaning up the oil. Sometimes you win and sometime you don't. With this product we didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: They look great when all lit up. We bought 2 sets. They arent holding up to many summer nights use. The tops are starting to tip needing tightening and you have to watch pulling the stakes out of the bottom when you move them or put them away. The stakes are easily reinserted but it can be annoying if you dont realize it was left behind because they are hard to find in grass and soil. Also they look alot bigger pictired online than they actually are. I would rather have what I imagined in the picture. But they will do for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice torches of medium quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when assembling as the bolt at the bottom of each torch was at an angle. Fortunately they straightened out as I screwed the posts in. Assembly was super easy and outside the initial worry of being crooked, no trouble at all. Torches lit up immediately but burn with a black soot. I'm using Tiki citronella fuel oil but maybe my wick height is not right, or thats just the way they burn. Nice torches for the money, I paid about 45 total for the 3. Was going to buy another set but they were 99 just a week later and I don't think they are worth that much.
customer_reviews.author: MKE99

customer_reviews.title: Product Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box was in decent shape when it arrived, despite that however one of the metal support poles was noticeably bent when I took it out of the box. Also, due to a poor welding job, a connector piece had broken off of one of the torches rendering the whole torch useless, as it can no longer connect to the support pole. Since the box was in decent shape I attribute the damage to low-grade materials and poor craftsmanship. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought two packages.
customer_reviews.text: Note to manufacturer: While I appreciate sturdy packaging, this product took longer to take out of the package than it did to put together. Once filled with citronella oil and lit, they do a great job keeping mosquitoes away for our summertime events. We were able to secure them in the ground / grass very easily and even it's windy outside, they stay did not sway. More elegant than the bamboo Stakes
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Preston

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for. Sleek and elegant and they seem to be high quality. The only improvement I could make would be that they be another foot taller. I didn't really notice the height and they are shorter than my last set of torches. Overall very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGurl

customer_reviews.title: Solid - Well Made - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought eight of these. They were easy to assemble and well made. The spike at the bottom is plastic, but quite sturdy, so I don't think that's a problem. They look great around my deck and have worked flawlessly so far. My only complaint would be that the hole into which you pour the fuel is quite small. It's easy to spill and difficult to see when you've reached the correct level. So, I bought a 2 cup measuring cup with a nice, small, pointy spout and I keep it with the fuel and use it for filling -- problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: DLO - Illinois

customer_reviews.title: The Look is Amazing but...
customer_reviews.text: The part that connects the bottom to the top part is in 3 pieces. So ya gotta screw one part off and then a part that resembles a washer just fell... Thank goodness I didn't handle it over the balcony. It would be lost in the canyon. So, if you purchase this, you must assemble the bottom pole part to the bottom of the part that holds the oil via the part that looks like a washer. It was kinda hard after I put the oil in and then attach the bottom, then mount it on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Donia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble Tiki torches!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and work great. I’ve only had them for a week so I’ll update the review after they’ve weathered in the AZ sun. I bought these to try and help keep the mosquitos away and they seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Azrith

customer_reviews.title: Great to look at!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the patio! I secured them with zip ties. Cant tell the difference at night time. If you dont want to waste tiki fuel every time you pour, invest in a funnel. I didnt want to screw it off everytime a neesed a refill. Well made, under priced in my opinion. Con: not made for roof top patios Pro: absolutely amazing to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Joyousness

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage, total mess
customer_reviews.text: The quality and design are so bad.. after adding fluid to the unit to capacity, it started to flow out of the bottom. Like it broke loose. Now I have torch fluid all over my sidewalk and in the mulch.. what a disaster. Cleaning that stuff isn’t as easy as just using water.. will be requesting my money back after I throw these defective units in the garbage. Plus I want more fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as tall as I hoped, but these are nice looking. Well packaged. I used rebar hammered into the ground on angles so two torches cross each other like in Hawaii. I removed the plastic ground stakes and placed the poles over the rebar. Nice and secure and much better looking than having them just standing straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Work as expected. Sturdy. Had them for a few months in South Florida fall. Use them daily to weekly depending on weather. Little rust showing on the chain. Otherwise looking and functioning well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander family

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish i did not buy these, they are very short once you secure them in the ground, yes it stats 60inch, but really they might be 2ft. Its the worst concept of filling them, I had to get a water bottle to fill the tiny hole after you take out the wick. What a mess.. Once the torch fuel is gone mostly likely will never use them again. :( what a bummer
customer_reviews.author: athena

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Just Some Quirks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but it does have some quirks. When you attempt to screw the top into the pole it comes out crooked. They all have a slight tilt to the top, don't know why but they do. We have used them and the slight tilt does not effect their usage. I will say the do work to keep the bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: F. J. Latham

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice and match my wicker furniture well. I was disappointed when I first purchased this and noticed that the screws on the bottoms of the canisters were slightly bent. When I tried to correct it one snapped off; however, i didn’t receive a replacement for it right away and they have held up thus far. One of the tips of the steaks broke off by that was attributed to may son pulling at it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but..
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of these torches but had to figure out how to assemble. As other reviews mentioned you have to remove the rubber nozzle first then screw into the pole. It wasn’t obvious at first and it didn’t come with instructions. Also the canister is solid so you don’t really know how much oil is in there when adding it. I just used a self made measuring cup then added with funnel.. which you probably need because the top has a narrow hole.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic but don't count on them to stop mosquitos!!!
customer_reviews.text: You'll need a funnel but these are great. Burned for many hours. For those noticing that they come together crooked, just bend the connection as you screw them together. The "bite defender" fuel did absolutely nothing to keep mosquitos away but they were still great for ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Krell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Torches
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our daughters outdoor party and were amazing. Worked real well creating a path to the bon fire. They were easy to fill. The wicks are good and will last a long time. The only thing that is a bummer is a number of the torches had a chipped finish because of the packaging. It is not real noticeable, but over time I see them rusting in these areas. This is the only reason to give them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: rjackson

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than the regular wicker tiki torches. They were relatively easy to assemble as long as you know what you are doing. Took me 5 minutes to assemble all 4. Sturdy enough design except for the chain that connects the cap can break easily. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It has been a dream of ours to have a water feature, and to have it look great at night too. This helped, as well as our other outdoor purchases, make our dream come true. Love how it looks, easy to install, and so far, holds up to all weather. Keeps the bugs away too.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado World

customer_reviews.title: Look good and work well
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for about a month now.. They are very nice and work very well. We are happy with these torches and use them every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love love LOVE!! Do not try to remove white piece in pole...
customer_reviews.text: These a are GREAT!! For the customers asking about removing a white piece in the pole... You don't remove the white piece in the pole, you remove the rubber piece at the bottom of the torch and it will answer all questions after that lol ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Solid Poduct - Read Further if Having Trouble Assembling
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good product, but there is a lack of instructions when it comes to putting them together. There are little cylinders of rubber that you have to remove in order to screw the canister into the white plastic in the pole. Maybe it's obvious to some, but it wasn't immediately apparent to us. One other minor gripe is that the canisters don't all screw on perfectly straight. They sit a little askew when fully screwed in. Still worth buying though as they look great when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Carl N.

customer_reviews.title: I love the elegance it brings
customer_reviews.text: It’s metal and a great finish... tall enough and works great! However if you have pets they can bend the pole or break the steak into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Oleta Crofoot-Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive on the patio.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid metal that didn’t bend or break. Wasn’t flimsy when putting in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and the best part is the spike to put it in the ground easily. However 2 out of the 4 were bent upon arrival which I was bummed about. I don’t like the small hole to fill with oil. Only the wick comes off to refill.
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: The only thing you have to be a little concerned about us after they’ve been outside for a while they’re hard to unscrew to put more oil back in and mine don’t get rained on but they do get direct sun. They work really well though. Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nervous about longevity, came dented.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened, started to set up, and its got holes in parts. Need them this weekend, so no time to return and get from elsewhere, but disappointed in the quality. Nervous about how "durable" it really is.
customer_reviews.author: benny wright

customer_reviews.title: Good detail to compliment a backyard
customer_reviews.text: These are cool and have a good rouged texture. They have survived kids hitting them with the power wheel..
customer_reviews.author: FrankO

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice item and the price compared to similar items is fantastic. It’s definitely worth purchasing if you’re looking and considering whether you should buy or not!
customer_reviews.author: jb17

customer_reviews.title: Really nice lamps at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice lamps with sturdy one piece poles and metal stakes. Definitely a beautiful addition to our deck and creates an exotic mood! I recommend these lamps and will be ordering more for myself.
customer_reviews.author: ChadCK

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to fill
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and work well. But filling and refilling is frustrating. Especially refilling. When you take the wick out it is hard to get back in and you get covered in oil.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Torches!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so pretty and they work fairly well! Have these on the patio in Florida and it starts to make a difference about 1/2 hour of being on I noticed. Doesn’t completely keep mosquitos away but it does make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy G

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and classy, heavy duty. Only complaint is they are not quite as tall as I am used to and the fill tube does not detach. Have to fill in place.
customer_reviews.author: David W Gravett

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for sitting around my fire pit and pool. They aren’t as tall once they go in the ground but they will still do the task intended.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna R. Darden

customer_reviews.title: Not high end made but works fine for camping.
customer_reviews.text: The screws were crooked and so the looked bent over but we bent them slowly to straighten. Not sure they will last more than a season or two but they worked for our camping season so far. Packaged well and didn’t arrive damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made very well
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing bends, won’t screw together correctly without you bending it in place, and the hole to pour the fluid in is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Merica

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Product
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. As at least one other reviewer appears to have experienced, after only a couple uses the metal twist off cap where the wick sticks out forged to the main body of the torch. Meaning it cannot unscrew and the torch cannot he refilled so when it runs out of torch fuel you can no longer use it. I even used various tools to try and remove it, no luck. Consequently, I will be having to order another set of torches. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Welch

customer_reviews.title: Broken Parts
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to write a review since we can't even use the torches. I bought two packs of these and after opening the box two are defective. On one the screw is completely off and can't be attached. On another the screw is crooked. I haven't even opened the second box. I hope the company will at least provide some customer service to replace the broken pieces. I will update if they do.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Slade

customer_reviews.title: Classy, easy and beautiful light.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful torchlight around our backyard. The attached caps make it super easy to snuff out too. Classy finish, upgrades our yard
customer_reviews.author: Bbyngla

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of bronze (brown) but received a set of black. I decided not to go through the hassle of returning them so I kept them. One of the four was missing a piece inside the pole for the top to screw into so my husband had to Macgyver it to make it work. Once positioned and lit, they work great. Just a little disappointing to pay $90 and not get exactly what I ordered AND have a piece missing. Overall, they look great and definitely keep the bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: My set of 4 torches only came with 3 oil cans. I can't find an way to request the missing item without returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Profuct
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to assemble! Very sturdy! Used these outside surrounding my patio. Gave a lot of light and the burn lasted a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baragry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Look great too. My only complaint is after using when needing to refill it’s difficult to unscrew to add more fluid. Your hands get super dirty from the burnt wick and they stick from ashes. Otherwise these late great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Great in the Yard.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well make. Need to watch My nephews around them: something about boys 'n fire.
customer_reviews.author: DrewT4R

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, easy to assemble, the tops screwed in all weird and not straight so I had to give it some modification.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Entertaining friends not bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most sturdy of tiki torches however still standing strong months later. Kinda hard to open to refill. Leave cap somewhat loose to make easier. Keeps the mosquitoes at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ockerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice torches
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. The torches are exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble and work great!
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Valline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase. We have a total of 16 throughout our yard. We live in Texas off the water and they work great for Mosquito's. They're elegant in style at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Look great. Work well. Bases are hard to line up when tightening. Other than that they are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but assembled poorly
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are very pretty to look at but they aren’t assemble very well at all....3 out of the 4 lanterns were crooked when screwed in. The screws are welded to the lamp almost sideways. They sent a replacement but they’re also defective as well. If the manufacturer could get them assembled straight, they would be an awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Style is nice but quality not there
customer_reviews.text: One of the torches arrived dented. Manufacturing is poor. The hole where the rod connects to the lantern was drilled off center so the torch appears crooked.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: An attractive and functional addition to our backyard!
customer_reviews.text: I will light them up tonight as far as function goes since we had to wait for fuel to absorb into wick! But the matte black and sleek look is so attractive! Cannot wait to see them lit up! Price point was reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: peevee

customer_reviews.title: Simple and chic
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of torches but the caps were a bit tricky to put on. Function well and I really like the color!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Albert

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The wicks didn’t support a flame even with high quality oil. The poles fell with slight wind and spilled the oils. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great torches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 8 of these to add to the decor of an outside party. They were easy to assemble and light. Basically they are ready right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: HGK

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these they seem sturdy and so far the wicks haven't got wet in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these, but upon assembly, one of the pegs that screws into the pole broke clear off. We tried to gorilla glue it back on, but after just a couple of days, it broke again. The other pegs are crooked, so the tiki heads are crooked. If you’re wanting something sturdy and reliable, I’d recommend something else.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tupa

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great buy!
customer_reviews.text: compared this buy to other sets available and this was defintley a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: They look so cool and abstract. Solid. Metal stakes for the ground, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product. I love the quality of the product. The only problem I faced is that one of the caps didn't have cover but I still kept it
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These torches are nice and good value for the money, however 1 of them came really crooked and broken bottom, so I’m not sure about the quality of the product and how long it will last, and since it’s a pack of four i don’t really have the option of returning one so I only have 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: joey eye

customer_reviews.title: Good looking great value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking easy to assemble only thing is the plastic stakes don't stay in the bottom the greatest. Totally great value
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it my only issue is it’s hard to twist off to refill once the oil burns out
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Cherry

customer_reviews.title: We lived those tiki torches
customer_reviews.text: Those tiki torches work great, easy to put together, don’t leak and looked great in our yard for decor too. We’ve been using citronella oil on them and it’s working great.
customer_reviews.author: NATALIA RIMI HEISTERKAMP

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Once you put them in the ground enough to be sturdy, a little short.
customer_reviews.author: phil shumate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice torches
customer_reviews.text: They are nice torches and they blend well with our patio decor
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. This company has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Colston

customer_reviews.title: good looking but poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: as with some, if not all of the other reviewers the threads that connect the lamp part to the stake were off center on all four in my box, very frustrating as they are sturdy and well packaged but all have a slant to them which in my opinion ruin them
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Compton

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Sleek, sturdy and easy to put together. I definitely recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EKV

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I wouldn’t recommend this product. It was easy to assemble. Looked like the pic. Added the Tiki fuel. But did not ignite, let alone hold a flame. Unfortunately, I’m going to have to toss. Rarely do I leave reviews, but I purchased four tikis for an outdoor event at my home, and was unable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leann Wilson Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Chic
customer_reviews.text: Such a stunning addition to the backyard! An affordable way to add classic pizzaz. Ordering another box!
customer_reviews.author: PDW Family

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality....crooked
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 torch base mounts were off center and bent. Several of the rods were also bent. Not worth the 40$ we paid for them. Unfortunately we didn't see these problems till after we filled them with oil and then screwed them to the bases. I'd say they would be good at half the price. Need to look into returning them....
customer_reviews.author: Bill Law

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at and it work well Keeping the  mosquitos If you use the citronella liquid.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assembly it looks great with my patio furniture and it works well keeping the mosquitoes away. It gives off a nice light when it’s lit up. When it’s not lit up it looks beautiful because of the sleek smooth design I got the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsidai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, look great.
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to put together, just what we were looking for. Easy to move around if needed.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Best tiki torches I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking and worked perfectly ! Really set the mood. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Broken torches
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box and assembled my torches. Unfortunately one of the four leaks tiki oil. I’m not sure what to do about that but I basically have one torch that is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Cartier

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! Much more so than I thought due to the price. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! I didn't want cheap looking tiki torches, and these are beautiful, simple to assemble, and work great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Crooked and one had a leak
customer_reviews.text: The tops of each torch is crooked and one of the 4 torches had a leak in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Fehr

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of  4 of the will work. Screw snapped off.
customer_reviews.text: I like them , but one snapped off as I was screwing into the stake.:(
customer_reviews.author: darci

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: 2 broke right away, they are very flimsy. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: vamby7777

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bought my first set and went ahead and bought a second. My friend like them so much, I got her some. Sturdy, pretty, And very durable
customer_reviews.author: kimberly holland

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would not recommend. Two of the four were bent and leak oil or fuel from the bottoms. Packaging was in excellent condition . Doesn't look like the craftsmanship is that great. My bamboo from Home Depot and some even from the dollar store hold up better then these do.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Harper

customer_reviews.title: nice torches
customer_reviews.text: The torches were easy to put together. I have only used them once but I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Keauxalla

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Torch screws came bent. I had to use pliers to straighten them out. These torches are super flimsy. They do light well but not worth the money. Easier to get inexpensive bamboo ones and replace each year.
customer_reviews.author: wendy hughes

customer_reviews.title: 3/4 worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: I set them all up filled them with citronella. Three of them burned beautifully. One of them burned extremely low and looked as if the citronella was out but it was completely full. The wick was defective. I am guessing I can’t return them now that they’ve had citronella in them. I wouldn’t mind a replacement since they are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Gloriana Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Almost good but missing and broken means stays away
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces. Didnt go in straight. Contacted the seller and they never responded
customer_reviews.author: gil lieblich

customer_reviews.title: Deck denzen
customer_reviews.text: These are just as advertised. Easy to put together and work beautifully. If I have any complaint is that it takes pliers to unscrew the top when you need to refill them. We think that is because the metal has expanded when the torches were lit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ives

product_meta.title: Deco Home Set of 4 Tikki Backyard Torch - 60 inch Citronella Garden Outdoor/Patio Flame Metal Torch - Black Matt
feature_bullets: Quantity : Pack of 4 Torches (with required accessories including 4 Torch, 4 long lasting fiberglass wick, 12-piece pole, 4 metal snuffer cap)
How to fill oil: Use funnel or make a cone of plastic sheet and fill the oil in the torch. It is easily available in the market.
Material : Made of Iron, One torch holds 250ml. of torch fuel (fuel sold separately)
Each fill provides more than 6 hours of ambiance. DO NOT USE combustible oil like- Kerosene , alcohol, solvents.
Comes with a spike at the bottom for easy grounding. Color: Black; Height: 60"
